item.title: Believe and Do Good 2019
item.author: Nadia Zaman,
item.description: Monday 25th February marked the start of ‘Believe and Do Good’ (BADG) 2019. BADG is a campaign where Muslim Medics and Imperial Islamic Society collaborate to dedicate a week to doing good to our local community. Inspired by a verse from the Quran: “Indeed, those who have believed and done …
